title: Has anyone successfully gotten their podcast on Spotify? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, my podcast is on Spotify, at http://SubscribeMe.fm/spotify . I submitted it to Spotify through my podcast host Libsyn, which has an arrangement with them to automatically submit all their shows, as long as you’ve completed the Spotify setup. But Spotify appears to have opened up their submission process to all podcasters, and you can find their submission form at https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfKJ76t_tPV2jugdX14NeajSfp7EV0hcgjVki1GEGuoeyJvDw/viewform?c=0&w=1 // Ravi JayagopalP.S: Download My Paid Ebook For Free:Podcast Promotion Report - Free eBook from SubscribeMe.fm
